comments.html:
Thank you Rachel for sharing this. I was very curious about your writing process and tools involved but wasn't feeling confident to ask.

You have inspired me to start writing as well. So keep it going! ðŸ’ª

Hey Rodrigo, thanks very much for your comment. You should definitely start writing! Every day I have thoughts along the lines of "why bother? who even wants to read this?" but as I enjoy the process of writing itself and wish to get better at writing, I just keep going with it. Cheers.
